title: Power Lunch unavailable at specific locations
statement: Power Lunch is not available at Benihana locations in Monterey, Little Rock, Key West, Edison, Milwaukee, Las Vegas Strip, Las Vegas Westgate, Orlando Lake Buena Vista, and Brickell.

citations.quote: Available at all Benihana locations except for Monterey, Little Rock, Key West, Edison, Milwaukee, Las Vegas Strip, Las Vegas – Westgate, Orlando- Lake Buena Vista, Brickell
